Title: Pepito's Penguin School
Plot: Diego and Alicia are far away from home! They are on a trip doing some research and animal help in Antarctica, and this trip proves to be a busy one! A little penguin, Pepito, is lost and cannot find his way to his new school. Diego must help him find where his new school is, and how to get there.
Writer: Ligiah Villalobos, Valerie Walsh, Chris Gifford
